name: ITP 02 - Various Planters (Fascade Planters/Proprietary Planters)
PRELIMINARY APPROVALS
1 - Shop Drawings Approval
Acceptance Criteria: All shop drawings submitted and approved.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
2 - Physical Samples Approval / Selections of Material including Color
Acceptance Criteria: Physical samples, material types, and color selections submitted and approved.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
3 - Approval of Pedestal for Planters
Acceptance Criteria: Specifications for pedestals, including design, load capacity, and materials, submitted and approved.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
DELIVERED GOODS INSPECTION
1 - Verification of Delivered Items Against Shop Drawings
Acceptance Criteria: Delivered items match the approved shop drawings, verified by foreman with photographic evidence.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
2 - Confirmation of Delivered Goods Quantities
Acceptance Criteria: Quantities of delivered goods align with documented requirements, confirmed by foreman's sign-off.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
INSTALLATION INSPECTION
1 - Compliance of Fixings on Shop Drawings
Acceptance Criteria: Installation of fixings verified against shop drawings, approved by foreman.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
2 - Completion and Testing of Waterproofing
Acceptance Criteria: Waterproofing finished as per design and successfully tested, with foreman's approval.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
3 - Security of Planter Installations
Acceptance Criteria: Planters secured correctly as per installation guidelines, confirmed by foreman's sign-off.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Surveillance
HANDOVER
1 - ITP and Handover Approval
Acceptance Criteria: ITP reviewed with client, all sections signed off.
Assignees and Verification Method: Internal - Hold Point, Client - Hold Point
HOLD POINT
